attributes.action: Request Ysbyty Glan Clwyd at Bodelwyddan, near Rhyl to reduce or phase out Car parking Charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Car parking charges at hospitals, and penalties and wheel clamping for offenders are extremely annoying, especially when visitors or out-patients are stressed and anxious.

Can you please undertake a survey and review of the car parking facilities and charges at the above mentioned hospital in the County of Denbighshire.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
